Description:
Functional Family Home with Space for Everyone
Located in the quiet pocket of Belmont sits this Cream Clinker brick 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom multiple car space family home. Perfect for the growing or established family needing multiple zones to keep everyone happy. Tastefully updated, recently painted and sitting on a corner allotment of 671 m2 (approx), the only thing you will have to do is redirect your mail and unpack the boxes.
With the formal lounge & dining room flowing from the central kitchen and sitting area, entertaining is something that will become a regular thing with family and friends. The well laid out kitchen includes electric cooktop & fan forced oven, dishwasher, pantry, appliance centre with ample cupboards & bench space overlooking a multi-functional sitting/ study area as well as a direct view & access to the back yard.
Downstairs you will find the Master bedroom with walk in robe and updated ensuite. The other two bedrooms offer built in robes & are close to the central family bathroom & updated laundry. Upstairs you will find a 4th bedroom with robe, full ensuite accessed off the large family rumpus area for the whole family, a teenage retreat or a great space for semi-independent living.
The flexibility of this property isn't confined to the inside with multiple areas outside to enjoy as well. The west side of the home offers a great entertaining space, soaking in the afternoon sun its perfect for the family BBQ or afternoon drinks. On the east side of the home is a concrete courtyard set up for the basketball ring, in ground sandpit and cubby house perfect for the kids to play all year round.
With two driveways both with double gate access, one leading to the carport high enough for caravan or large boat plus workshop at the rear of the home, offering extra storage. There is space to build extra garaging (stca) to suit your specific needs.
Close to popular schools, minutes from the Waurn Ponds shopping centre, Deakin University, Epworth Hospital and a short drive to the Surf Coast, you can see why this location is perfect for the family of all ages. We look forward to showing you around at one of our open days.

Sitting on a sizable allotment of approx. 565m2, this home offers the opportunity to renovate adding future value, move in and appreciate as is or hold onto an ideal investment.
